description: In the antebellum United States,
title: 12 Years a Slave

description: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

When an unconfident young woman is cursed with an old body by a spiteful witch, her only chance of breaking the spell lies with a self-indulgent yet insecure young wizard and his companions in his legged, walking castle.

description: From the Boer War through World War II, a soldier rises through the ranks in the British military.

description: In 1863, Amsterdam Vallon returns to the Five Points area of New York City seeking revenge against Bill the Butcher, his father's killer.

description: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.
title: American Graffiti

title: Good Morning, Vietnam

title: Nanook of the North

description: The story of
title: Finding Neverland

description: To satisfy his nagging parents, a gay landlord and a female tenant agree to a marriage of convenience, but his parents arrive to visit and things get out of hand.

description: Trying to find how a millionaire wound up with a phony diamond brings Hercule Poirot to an exclusive island resort frequented by the rich and famous. When a murder is committed, everyone has an alibi.

description: Dramatized portrayal of the Apollo manned space program.

description: A middle-aged bar hostess, constantly in debt, is faced with numerous social constraints and challenges posed to her by her family, customers and friends.

description: Frankenstein, a young medical student, trying to create the perfect human being, instead creates a misshapen monster. Made ill by what he has done, Frankenstein is comforted by his fiancée ...

description: In the police investigation of a brutal crime scene, one man was at the center of it all: legendary porn star John Holmes.

description: Dr. Jekyll allows his dark side to run wild when he drinks a potion that turns him into the evil Mr. Hyde.

description: In the small town of Mumford, a psychologist of the same name moves in and quickly becomes very popular, despite a questionable past.

description: A ski vacation turns horrific for a group of medical students, as they find themselves confronted by an unimaginable menace: Nazi zombies.

description: A wayward daughter invites her dying mother and the rest of her estranged family to her apartment for Thanksgiving dinner.

description: Allan visits the sinister Usher family mansion, where his friend Roderick is painting a portrait of his sickly wife Madeline. The portrait seems to be draining the life out of Madeline, slowly leading to her death.

description: In the peaceful countryside, Vassily opposes the rich kulaks over the coming of collective farming.

description: The state of Israel is created in 1948, resulting in war with its Arab neighbors.

description: A teenage girl lives as a prostitute in New Orleans in 1917.

description: A noblewoman discovers her husband is The Scarlet Pimpernel, a vigilante who rescues aristocrats from the blade of the guillotine.

description: A pair of crew members aboard a spaceship wake up with no knowledge of their mission or their identities.

description: Two years after the first series of murders, a new psychopath dons the Ghostface costume and a new string of killings begins.
